Topic.Title: Coke should have never split stock - too many shares out there to move.

Message.Msg: As time goes on after a split, there will be new stockholders that never owned KO before. This in the long run will enhance the price per share. As long as the Corp. profits grow, the shares will increase in value. Increased earnings per shsare drive the stock price.

Topic.Title: Great Company Here !! After the U.S. Lost Over 100,000 of our Guy's Over There in Vet. K.O. Helps them out. .

Message.Msg: Lost 100,000? How about over 400,000 would be more correct.
